price: A oni koji ne vjeruju u ajete i dokaze Naše, oni će biti – oni s lijeve strane,
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyātinā hum aṣḥābu al-mashamati
